channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RFK Jr makes Texas stop to visit family of 6-year-old measles victim, push MMR vaccine
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. made a stop in Texas on Sunday to visit the family of a 6-year-old girl who died in February after contracting the measles.

item.title: We Can Do Better Than IVF
item.description: Safer, more affordable alternatives exist: Here’s why President Trump should make them accessible to all Americans.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil Invites America to Judgment

item.title: Musk slams 'puppetmasters' after protesters struggle to explain why they call Trump a 'fascist' in viral video
item.description: Elon Musk said anti-Trump protesters are "puppets" who demonstrate against President Donald Trump without knowing "why they are even there."

item.title: Democrats Want Young Men Back. Just Ask Them

item.title: 65K North Carolina Voters Must Prove Identity Or Have Ballots Thrown Out In Supreme Court Race

item.title: ‘State-Enabled Kidnapping’: Colorado Democrat Bill Would Give Custody Of Kids To Parents Who Push Trans Mutilation

item.title: Despite Measures To Protect Women’s Sports, Girls Are Still Being Forced To Play Against Boys
item.description: Even after President Donald Trump's executive order, boys are still playing in girls' sports. Lawmakers need to step up.
